scenario_text.value: Hey... How you been passing the time lately?

Me too... Day after day, patrol, patrol,
patrol...

I’ve actually been cutting down on the patrol
time these days.

And whaddaya ya been doing with the extra
time?

The days were long n’ hard when Piedmon was
around...but at least we had something to do.

(These guys sound like a couple of office
workers sent to lick stamps in the basement.)
Look at me... Talk about pathetic.

But ain’t nothing we can do about it... How
do we get outta this mess?
